name: Tetraphobia Kickstarter Demo
description:
Check out the KickStarterto help bring the full world of Tetraphobia to life. Your pledges make a big difference to making this game a reality.

The demo features 3 different bosses, 28 different powerups, 20 different types of enemies and a host of different island layouts

Tetraphobia is a roguelike twin stick shooter set in a fantasy world where four Titans control floating islands referred to as "The Fractured Sky". Featuring fully destructible environments and a host of unique enemies, battle your way through procedurally generated low poly islands in the search for artifacts and discover if there’s any substance behind the fear that is Tetraphobia.

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1415228367/tetraphobia-indie-roguelite-in-a-world-of-floating-islands
